About Me

About me


Hello there! My name is Edison.
I’m a fullstack developer. I am originally from Quito-Ecuador, currently based in Houston-TX. I have experience developing projects using JavaScript, NodeJS and MongoDB. I am currently enrolled in a Fullstack Web Development bootcamp. On this website, you will find information about my portfolio as well as some projects that I have developed. I believe in the power of continuous learning and growth, and I am always seeking new opportunities to expand my skills and knowledge. I hope that you find my website informative and helpful, and I would love to hear from you!
